long_description: Small on size, big on performance, the MSR MicroRocket(TM) stove lets you travel light and cook up quick meals. MicroRocket stoves weighs in at just 2.6 oz. (75g) and has a compact design that allows it to stow easily inside an MSR Insulated mug (not included). Fully adjustable flame, from a rolling boil to a slow simmer, lets you cook gourmet meals; control valve is easy to operate even with gloved hands. Boils 1 liter of water in 3 min. 30 sec. Sturdy folding pot supports provide better stability than earlier MSR designs. Tri-sectional WindClip(TM) located at the burner helps shield the flame from a breeze. Stove is simple to operate, with no priming, preheating or pressurizing required; simply turn it on, light and start cooking. MSR MicroRocket stove includes a hand-held piezo igniter that easily sparks the stove to life. Due to flammable item shipping restrictions, we cannot sell fuel canisters online; they are available at REI retail stores.
short_description: Small on size, big on performance, the MSR MicroRocket(TM) stove lets you travel light and cook up quick meals.
